dcterms:creator: Dimitrios Tzionas
Juergen Gall
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of RGB-D videos used for reconstructing articulated rigged models, focusing on the kinematic structure of articulated rigid bodies.
dcterms:title: iCub sequence

dcterms:creator: Urbano Miguel Nunes
Yiannis Demiris
dcterms:description: A dataset used for 3D motion segmentation of articulated rigid bodies based on RGB-D data, focusing on the segmentation of motion in real-time.
dcterms:title: 3D subspace clustering based method

dcterms:creator: Samunda Perera
Nick Barnes
dcterms:description: A dataset for maximal cliques based rigid body motion segmentation using RGB-D camera data, focusing on the segmentation of rigid body motions.
dcterms:title: Maximal cliques based rigid body motion segmentation

dcterms:description: Various newly recorded sequences that were not explicitly cited in the references section.
dcterms:title: Various newly recorded sequences
